title: Improvement in process of finding the lost device.
content:
Disabling the functionality of:
1) Airplane Mode
2) Internet
3) Location
in the quick launch when the phone is locked and password to switch off and reset

By enabling these services with eSIM enabled device, users can trace and find their beloved phone in all the worst-case scenarios like lost and misplaced.

The thief cannot switch off the device, internet and location or enable airplane mode.
